item.description:
Volunteer and info session, fundraiser for The New Hempshire Foundation. We will be raising money for our federal 501(c)4 filing, for radio and tv ads, and other promotional expenses. $20 suggested donation, if you would like to contribute and can't attend, here's the chip in: http://amandadefense.chipin.com/the-new-hempshire-foundation
OR you can send a check to The New Hempshire Foundation, 24 Thornton Street, Derry, NH 03038!
Munchies are as welcome as fish sticks at a cat festival!
Refreshments will be served, as usual...


180 Woodbury Street, Manchester, NH
item.name: Hemp for Victory! Volunteer and info session
